pr_title: HBASE-24451 Remove the HasThread because the related bug had been fix…

timeline.message: HBASE-24451 Remove the HasThread because the related bug had been fixed since jdk7

timeline.bodyText: sleep is good enough right? why sleeps?
timeline.author: virajjasani

replies.bodyText: Oh yes, missed it. Let's name it sleepInterrupted because it makes thread sleep and if interrupted, returns true, else false.
replies.author: virajjasani

timeline.message: fix spotbugs, just ignore it, if we do not want to start a thread in constractor, maybe it is better to fix in another issue

timeline.bodyText: This is not needed w/ this patch?
timeline.author: saintstack

replies.bodyText:
Seems still needed, since the master here maybe a mocked one.
eg: DummyMasterServices in TestSplitLogManager, it extends MockNoopMasterServices which implement MasterServices, but does not extends Thread.
Thanks.
replies.author: bsglz

replies.bodyText: We should not worry about mocked objects. Ideally, we can provide getName() default implementation in MasterServices and HMaster specifically can implement getName() as Thread.getName(), that way here the caller will just call: String name = master.getName();
replies.author: virajjasani

replies.bodyText:
However, there is no harm w/o this change as Stack said. Maybe good to take this clean-up in separate Jira if you would like.
Will merge this PR in a while.
replies.author: virajjasani

replies.bodyText:
Good idea, will fix it in separate jira.
Thanks.
replies.author: bsglz

replies.bodyText:
Thanks @bsglz
I just triggered one build. Let it go through and one result is out, will merge the PR.
replies.author: virajjasani

replies.bodyText: In addition, maybe we can just always use master.getServerName().toShortString() as name here, WDYT?
replies.author: bsglz

replies.bodyText: Yes, is should be fine. Does it match with ((Thread)master).getName() exactly? If so, let's do it now, else later.
replies.author: virajjasani

replies.bodyText:
Not exactly.

getName returns master/xxx:16000
master.getServerName().toShortString() returns xxx:16000

So, will do it later.
Thanks.
replies.author: bsglz

timeline.author: saintstack

timeline.message: change implement to extends in comment
